choices: To be tickled by a professional tickler
1.content:
It's a pleasantly warm day with just a wisp of a breeze. So far, you have been traveling alone under the tree cover along the beach. Awfully strange to have oak trees along the beach, you realize, but they make for good shade. You step to your right, towards the water, and look up to the mountains. The sight is remarkably clear, and you can finally see it! There, in the distance, is Bing's fabled Tickle Mansion! You can barely make out the place, so it is still a ways off.

You pick a couple berries off a nearby bush and lean against a mighty tree, contented. All that blind drive is gone and you can finally remember why you're going:
1.title: A journey of 1000 miles...

11.content:
Everyone you've ever tickled said you were the best. But will you be good enough to join the ranks of the best ticklers out there? You close your eyes and wonder...

"Hoy there!" A jovial voice from the trees calls at you.

"Who's there?" you reply, seeing nothing.

"You sure are a strange looking one. What are you supposed to be, anyways?"

"What's the matter, never seen a...
11.title: From the canopy

choices: decline it and try to find another way around
111.content:
A green Yoshi is in front of you. He smiles and says, "Hello there, are you heading to the manshion?" he asks.

"Yes," you reply.

"Well then, you'll have to get through me. I'm only one of the many you'll have to get through to reach the manshion," he explains.

"How do I do that?" you ask him.

"Easy, just beat me in a tickle fight," he tells you.

What do you do?
111.title: Yoshi

1111.content: "Alright, I accept your challenge," you say with enthusiasum. You know your one of the best ticklers out there, so your pretty confident. Without warning, he lunges at you, but you manage to dodge him and he lands face-first in the dirt. You take the chance to quickly grab his right ankle and hold it tight. He start to struggle, but you hold him tight and begin to undo his shoelace. You slip off his red show and white sock to reveal a large green foot with three round toes. The yoshi struggles madly, giving the impression his feet are very ticklish. What do you do now?
1111.title: Accept the challenge

11111.content: You begin to use your fingers to tickle the Yoshi's bare foot. He suddenly bursts with loud laughter and squirms around madly. You manage to keep a firm hold on his ankle and go even faster, now getting his toes. He laughs much louder when you manage to and you spy a feather nearby. Do you keep using your fingers or use the feather?
11111.title: tickle his foot

choices: wait for him to wake up
111112.content: You pick up the feather and start to stroke the yoshi's foot with it. His laughter suddenly spikes up a fair amount and he squirms even more. "STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP IHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHI!!!!!!!!!" he shouts through his laughter. However, you continue for another few minutes, when he suddenly stops laughing. you look and see the the Yoshi has passed out from laughing so much. What now?
111112.title: use the feather

1111121.content: You decide to leave the Yoshi and move on. you come to a lake after a little and sit down. You take a drink of water and soon fall asleep. A little while later, your woken up by a tickling sensation on your feet. You open your eyes to see
1111121.title: leave him and continue on

choices: "I sure hope your ticklish-considering what's about to happen!"
11111212.content:
You are just starting to gradually wake up from a deep, refreshing sleep when you feel something small and sharp sliding along your right foot. You chuckle more than a little, twitching, but don't bother too get up or even look at who or what's tickling you. Instead, you simply continue to ly there with your eyes closed, enjoying the feeling . You can feel it tracing delicately around the ball of your foot in an elliptical pattern and slooowly sliding down your arch to start spiraling around your heel, before heading back up towards your toes some time later.

         Your eyes pop open as the sensations start to poke around, on and off, in the skin between the pudgy didgits, and you let out a genuine guffaw, fully wake now. "Okay-okay! I'm up! I'm up!" You laugh, turning towards the source of the faint tickling. A doe with short brown fur, flecked with faint white spots and turning to a bright, eye catching- white colour on her belly, kneels by your foot, idly doodling her fingers all over it. She turns lightly, a pair of caramel colored eyes, flecked with gold, meeting yours. "Well, well, look who's finally awake..."
11111212.title: a furry-Now what?

choices: "Let's keep going around the lake and back to the trees-it'll be quicker."
"Let's head back to the beach for a while, so we don't lose sight of the place."
111112121.content:
You reply as you fully stand up, mirroring her. "Sorry, no. I was just heading over to the place, actually, to see if they'd let me join as a full-time Tickler. How 'bout you?"

"Me? Nah. Like you, I'm not from the mansion, either. Heck, I'm even going there for the same reason you are; I want to know if they're hiring, or handing out certification, or whatever it is they do there. Say, wanna travel togethor the last little ways? It isn't far now."

         You consider for only a few seconds, cupping your chin in one hand. You notice that she doesn't wear any clothing; like many anthros, it seems that she feels her furr is all that's necessary to prevent her from public embarassment or danger due to the elements.

         Without warning, you lunge forward, digging your hand sinto her sides.
"Eeep! -Hahahaha! What the-Hahah!" She bursts out laughing, bringing in her arms and stumbling back. With the skill of long practice, you keep pace, not letting up in the slightest. She stumbles and instinctively goes to the ground, landing on her short tail, trying to get away from your tickling fingers. Youd on't even bother to very the routines, just keep your hands firmly clamped in position, only helped by her arms, rapidly wiggling your short fingers. After a few moments, you abruptly let up, grinning down at her as she wipes dampness from her watering eyes.

"Well, seeing as you're ticklish, I'm sure I wouldn't mind you coming along. " You chuckle, turning your back on her and bending to pick up your pack.

         Unexpectedly, she hurles herself forward, tripping you up as she latches around her legs. Before you fully understand what's happening, you're lying on the ground on your front, your feet nestled in the crook of one of her arms. "Hay, wait, what the- Gah! Ahahaha!" With shocking speed, you already feel her fingers rapidly running over your big feet, not nearly as gentle as she had earlier. You understand that she needs to keep you fully off balance with the maximum amount of tickling on short notice, and know that if you can rally you should be able to even it up a bit.

That was theory.

         In practice, you could barely roll around and reach her if she wasn't tickling the heck out of your poor, soft green soles. Now, you can only twist aorund and thrash on the ground, laughing crazily.

         Like you, though, she lets up after a few seconds, sprightly jumping back to ther feet and leaving you to massage the lingering feeling sout of your feet. "There! I'm surprised you have such ticklish feet; I haven't had the fun of tickling someone like that in too long. And if you try to tickle me again, rest assured there's plenty more where that came from."

"Is that a threat?" You ask playfully, once again getting up and hauling on your pack. "Well, now that we more or less seem to understand each toher , can we get going?"

She grins, and suggests a course.
111112121.title: This is what.

choices: You never know- they might hire us both. Or we could pretend to be a team.
115.content:
"Course I seen a moogle before! You're just funny lookin!" laughs the voice. Sure enough, a moogle drops down and lands gracefully, only feet from you. This one is taller and leaner with a bigger head and salmon-colored fur.

"You're funny looking yourself!" you joke back at him. "What are you doing in this part of the world?"

The moogle puffs out his chest, pounds it with a fist, and proudly announces "I'm gonna be a professional tickler at the mansion!"

You jump to your feet with glee. "Me too!" But your new friend does not share your joy.

"Well, one of us obviously isn't. Ever heard of the mansion hiring two of the same species who wern't a team for prof. tickling?"

"Well, I honestly don't know much about the mansion, to tell the truth."

"We could both walk alllllll the way there, get tested, and one has to walk alllllll the way back, or we could settle it right here, right now. Once and for all: who is the best tickler?"
115.title: Competition

1151.content:
"Alright, lets do it!" Your wits are sharp and ready for contest.

"Okay, there's two ways we can go about this. Either we tickle each other, which could prove a little unfair, or find something else around here and capture it. I'll win either way, so you choose."
1151.title: Decisions, decisions

12.content:
They say the best ticklers in the world live up in that castle. That's good for you, because you are a bit embarrassed to ask your friends to tickle you. Maybe there you can get it out of your system.

A small lake (or a large puddle) sits only feet from you, which you crawl towards. The water is still enough to show you your own reflection. You see..
12.title: Only the best will do

121.content:
A drunken voice yells to itself some 100 yards off; you decide to investigate. In no time at all you find a lively red-brick cabin, caked in moss and wood. A short hare and an angry duck storm off in the other direction and return with a belligerent cat in their care. You approach the door to find a lively tavern, packed with people and a roaring fire. The door is directly next to the bar.

"Can I help you?" asks a gruff beaver working the bar.

"Yeah, how far off is the mansion from here?"

"Maybe a day or two," he replies, spit-shining a mug absentmindedly. "You need a night of rest first, and here we are. You have any money?"
121.title: The inn in the woods

1211.content:
"Well, that can be remedied. Go right down there, hang a right, and you'll see some stocks. Tell the guy there you want to make some money."

"Thanks then," you reply, confused.

You pass all sort of drunken creatures here. Most of them are at least faintly familiar. Sure enough, you find a row of stocks without much issue. Several other people are in other stocks: a Mewtwo is being rib-tickled by a sneering fox, a pair or squirrels are waiting idly by, looking terrified, and an Agumon is having his feet tormented by a Gatomon's tongue.

"Here to make some cash, mac?" hisses the fox.
1211.title: A free lunch

12111.content: "Alright, for a night here and a good pair of meals would be three hours in the stocks. You want to try for it?"
12111.title: Part-time work

121111.content:
"Suit yourself. Put these on, will ya?" The fox throws you a pair of leather bracers with karabiners on the sides. By the time you have strapped both on to a comfortable fit, the fox has a set of stocks ready for you. You sit on a small stool which comes to the bottom of your shoulder blade and the fox locks your feet into the perfectly-fitted stocks. Then, he strings a chord over a rafter and clips either end into the karabiners. Your knees are slightly bent and your upper arms sit parallel with the ground.

"I'm going back to the Mewtwo over there. You should probably hope that someone goes for the squirrels first."
121111.title: On the job

choices: She keeps up on your feet
1211112.content:
"Gabumon, what are YOUUUU doing here?" asks a slightly tipsy Gatomon. This isn't just any Gatomon; this is Kari's!

"Gatomon, I didn't recognize you! What are you doing here?"

"No, what are youuu doing here?" she slurs.

"Are you going to the mansion to get tickled, too?" asks Tai's Agumon. Gatomon has begun sticking her fluffy fingers between your toes, making you giggle.

"Oh, hey Agumon! Wow, I wish I knew ...heh hey! I wish I knew you were into tickling so I could save myself a trip."

"Oh, its still worth going. I was hearing all about it from Elecmon- he went last year, and he loved it. Gatomon is going to get tickled too; she just won a coin toss on who would, um, 'finance the trip.'"

It has been hard to concentrate with Gatomon's little paws nipping at your wrinkle-worn soles.

"Heeyy.. has anyone ever told you you have really nice feet?" Gatomon is now nibbling gently on the ball of your left foot.

"Well, I think you just did." She claws playfully at your feet in a waterfall motion.
1211112.title: Friends in Low Places

122.content: You are a large red dragon. You have been wanting to be ticklish for a long time, seeing as you are the only dragon you know who isn't ticklish. just then, you hear a sound in the trees nearby which seems like faint laughter. what now?
122.title: A Dragon

1221.content: You decide to investigate the noise and head into the woods, searching for the source of the noise. After a little while you find it. You come up to a large clearing, and see a pink dragoness around your age in a pair of metal stocks being tickled by what seem to be vines coming out of the ground. She is laughing like mad and trying desperatly to free herself, but to no avail. What do you do?
1221.title: investigate

choices: Ask if she'd like to join you
12211.content:
You decide to help her. Using your powers, you burn the vines to ash with your fire breath, and break the stocks open with your strength. She stands up and looks you in the eyes. She seems to be around 13, your age. "you alright," you ask, blushing lightly, thinking she's cute.

"Yeah, thanks alot," she says, also blushing lightly.
What now?
12211.title: Help her

122111.content:
"So, why are you here?" you ask her.

"well, i'm going to the manshion to become a great tickler. What about you?" she asks.

"I'm going there too to try and become ticklish" you tell her. "Do you want to go there together?" you ask her, blushing.

"S-sure," she replys, also blushing.
What do you do now?
122111.title: Ask what she's doing here

1221112.content:
"But first, why don't I show you my skills at tickling," you suggest.

"Alright," she says.

"Great," you say smiling. "Lay on your back please," you ask her, and she does so. You then start to tickle her belly, causing her to laugh loudly. after a few minutes, you switch to her...
1221112.title: Show her your ticklling skills

choices: Headlock those beauties and turn them pink as the rest of her!
12211121.content:
"Ohhoho-kah-hay!" She laughs, bringing her bare arms down protectively over her belly after a few minutes and rolling over to evade your probing claws. "Hahaha... Whew! You were right; you are pretty good."
         You beam at the praise, worming your way down to the end of her body on your knees. "Thanks! Most of what I know I learned first-hand; when my siblings and their friends tickled me when I was little." You relax cross-legged at her feet, pulling the fleshy tickle-targets into your lap. She doesn't resist as she responds.

         "Really? People used to tickle you too? I'm the same case, only I always preferred dishing it out to taking it. I had an older brother and sister, and they would always run or fly me down and tickle me for a-hey-hages!" She lets out another of those cute little giggles as you trawl an exploratory set of fingers up her slowly wiggling left sole. "But, I had some friends of my own, and we got together and ambushed them from time to time. There was so ma-ha-ha-any! of us that (hee hee!) they usually couldn't really do anything."
         "Is that so? Sounds like you were all quite the tickle-devils." You say, regarding the feet in front of you. Both soles are the white undertone that you see runs up the inside of her legs up to her thighs, over her belly, and colours her underarms. The foot proper was the same shade of crystalline light-pink as the rest of her. There were, sadly, only four large toes bedecking them, flexing back and forth as you gradually grow more aggressive, lightly pinching and scratching at tempting patches of skin.

         "Ahaha! Yeheheh-eep!-hep, we would pretend to (Ha-herm!) to want to play a game with one of them, and get them alone. Then two of us would tackle their legs and trip them up, which let the others grab their arms -Gahahaha! Notthearch! Nothearch! Hahaha!- and hold them down. There was usually five of us, so each got a limb to keep track of while one could tickle without," Pinning a foot with one hand, you suddenly screw your pointer finger into the height of the arch with the other, briefly driving her wild. "Aw gahahahawd thahat tihihickles- Ahahahaha!- Hahaha, hehe, hoa.. Without interruption. My big bro had the most ticklish upper body out of everyone who's ever lived, but my sis's feet... Ahahaha-heehee! Those were to die for."
         Shifting on the spot, you tuck both feet under one leg, held in the shape of an inverted 'v', and start to flicker your pointed tail-tip over the pale expanse, slowly feeding in more fingers.

         "Ahahaha! And she would always end up getting tickled there, too!" (You skitter your fingers over one soft sole.) "Haha! Just walking across grass, walking on thick, fuzzy carpet, hahaha! And she always had to be on the alert whenever she was lying down; always," With your tail delicately wrapped around her big toes, you bring all your fingers together in the centre of both arches and slowly spread them outward, before dragging them back in again, exerting more force each time and carefully timing it with her words. "On... The.... Watch... For the... Tickling fingers... Ofsome passerby! Errgh-umph!Ahahahahaha!" She breaks out into full-fledged angelic laughter as you intensify your attack, succumbing to what you wanted to do since the start and scratching away almost angrily, tail forcing the toes back and holding the entire nerve-laden surface at your mercy (or lack there-of).

         "Well whatever they were like, I bet they weren't as ticklish as these!" You taunt, as she claps a hand over her eyes and falls back, yelling with the excess laughter that had been slowly building over the course of your conversation.
12211121.title: Palaver, Tickles, and Toes.

choices: Let's have some ticklish fun; eat some weird berries
Let's continue; eat some red berries
122112.content:
"Well I was heading towards the mansion up there in the mountains. It's the only place nearby, so do you want to come with me?" you offer.

"You mean Bing's Tickle Mansion?" she asks. "Sure! I was headed there anyway! That is until these vines got me." She turned to look at the cinders that were once her relentless ticklers. They didn't look like much anymore except a pile of ashes. "Thanks again by the way. That was some pretty impressive fire."

"Thanks. Look, maybe we should leave before we find out if that plant had friends," you suggest. Walking back towards where you came, you turn to see the dragoness pick up the pair of stocks and follow. Together you return to the trail where first you heard her.

Again, you look into the distance to see Bing's Tickle Mansion nestled in the mountains. Between it and you lies a mountain range, the forest, and the lake. The path you were following takes you around the lake, through the forest in mountains and all the way to the mansion itself. The journey will be a least a couple more days, but at least now you have a companion.

Both of you turn left and continue to follow the trail. After a few minutes of silence, you try to begin a conversation with the cute dragoness. "So how did you end up like that anyway?" you ask.

"Oh," she says, blushing. "Well, I was on my way to the mansion when I felt the sudden urge to sleep. So I stepped off the trail, set down my stocks, and dozed off. When I woke up I was locked in and being tickled by those vines." She shook her head. "I like being tickled, but those vines were just too much. I was tickled for nearly half an hour before you showed up. I can't tell you how relieved I was when you burst through the bushes."

"Half an hour? Must've been tough," you reply. "Sorry by the way, for busting those stocks of yours."

The dragoness shakes her head violently. "No no no no, it's okay. I can easily repair them." She glances at the stocks in her arm. "I've had these for a long while now. I've both been tickled and tickled people in them. They're quite handy!" she giggles.

There is a break in the conversation while the two of you traverse a river. You wade through the current, shielding your eyes from the bright sunlight reflecting off the clear water. On the other side you see the trail leaves the shore and enters a lush jungle, filled with brightly colored berries hanging from healthy green bushes and trees. You see a couple birds fly through the canopy, but apart from that see scarce signs of wildlife.

You turn back and see the dragoness with the stocks above her head wading through the river behind you. Behind her you see the path that hugged the shore until now, and the clump of trees where you found the dragoness. You also turn to look at the mountains, still in front of you and a bit to the right. You think ahead to the long days of traveling that await you, but once again make light that at least you have company.

Emerging from the river, both you and the dragoness bask in the sun a bit, letting the heat dry your scales. You spread you wings, feeling the warmth spread across them. You turn and walk forward with your friend still in tow, thinking about how to keep the conversation going. "So why are you going to the Tickle Mansion?" you ask finally.

"Oh, to tickle and be tickled," she answers calmly. "Especially to tickle. I've always liked tickling ever since I was a
hatchling, when I was tickled by my older brother. It was fun, but it was even more fun when I got to tickle him back!" She giggles at the memory. "Since then I've always asked people I knew if I could tickle them. Some find me a bit weird, but I don't mind. It doesn't endanger any of my friendships." She pauses while the two of you pass into the jungle. "I hear that all the greatest ticklers assemble at the mansion, so I hope they can teach me a thing or two. I also hear there's an assortment of some of the most ticklish people in the world there. I can't wait to tickle some of those people!" She smiles and then thinks for a bit. "So why are you going to Bing's Tickle Mansion?" she asks in return.

You reply, "I came for pretty much the opposite reason." You close your eyes and remember those times you spent
with your friends long ago, how you'd end up in tickle fights and laugh so hard your sides would ache. Ah, good times. "I spent most of my youth getting tickled by friends and family," you continue. "At first I didn't think of it as anything other than something for them to torture me with, but when I grew up I began to really enjoy it. Soon I was looking forward to the times my cousins would come over and tickled me senseless, and enjoying the times when my ganged up and tortured me, sometimes for days while our parents were out on hunts."

"Wow," the dragoness comments. "You must've liked it a lot. Days straight, just wow. And I was only tickled for half and hour."

"I'm going to Bing's Tickle Mansion to be tickled by some of the best ticklers in the world. Just the thought of being trapped in a set of stocks with my arms taught above me, at the mercy of ticklers for days sets my heart thumping." You turn to look at her and smile. "And maybe you might be one of them."

The cute dragoness immediately blushes and bright red. "W-well, I guess tickling you would be rather fun, uh, if you'd be okay with that." You take satisfaction in the fact that she's a little nervous, but decide to let her off the hook.

Chuckling, you say, "we should probably get there though, right?"

"R-right," she answers. Unable to look at you anymore she turns away. You turn forward and continue down the worn path. A few more minutes, and you hear the dragoness behind you. "Oh wow. We don't even know each other's names. I'm Sarah, by the way."

You introduce yourself, and together you continue into the lush jungle. The berries on either side look tasty, but you aren't hungry yet. You take note however, that the juiciest berries are the blue ones and they will be the first ones you will try.

Eventually the day ends and the moon peeks through the tees. The sounds of wildlife die down around you, and crickets chirp somewhere in the distance. Both you and Sarah fight the urge to sleep, but soon you are unable to resist. You wander a bit farther into a nice open clearing settle down and sleep.

At daybreak, you get up and rub your eyes. Unfolding your wings and stretching, you yawn and examine the place where you have slept.

You are in a berry patch, with bushes covered in berries of all kinds in neat rows. Right next to you is Sarah, who is just beginning to wake up, and her set of stocks. To the left is the path from which you came, so to the right is where you want to go. Your stomach is growling though, and the berries look quite appetizing. There is a sign by the first row of bushes that reads:

PLEASE READ
Berries have different effects. Please read and be sure to select only the ones you want.
Yellow berries = temporary paralysis
Blue berries = more sensitive skin
Red berries = no effect

You think about it. You wanted to be tickled, and you had someone who enjoyed tickling right next to you. Who says you can't be tickled now? Of course there will be more ticklers at the mansion. It's up to you. Either eat the weird berries and have some fun, or eat some red ones and continue your journey.
122112.title: Ask if she'd like to join you

choices: Only eat one kind of berry
1221121.content:
Paralysis means that Sarah could easily move you into any position she desires, and you wouldn't be able to move an inch. She could totally reign down on whatever part of you she wished, and force you to accept your fate.

Heightened sensitivity means your already hyper ticklishness will be multiplied tenfold. Even a slight touch could send you into a fit of giggles. But it may be hard to stay still. Ah well, that's what the stocks are for, right?

Or you could eat both, being completely at Sarah's mercy and extremely hyper-sensitively ticklish. But might that be a bit too much? Well, that's why you're going to the Tickle Mansion; may as well start now.

Your choice.
1221121.title: A little or a lot?

choices: Get paralyzed and helpless and eat the yellow berries
Become extremely ticklish and eat the blue berries
12211211.title: Choose

122112111.content:
You decide to eat the yellow berries. You suddenly feel a quick surge of electricity shoot throughout your body, and then you fall on your back. It didn't hurt at all, though.

"Um...are you ready?" she asks.

You try to nod. "Yeah," you say instead.

"Where do you want to be tickled first?"

You choose...
122112111.title: Immobilized

choices: ...upper body." (underarms, ribs, sides, belly, belly button)
12211212.content:
The plan is all set in your head, just another preparation before you can move forward.

Looking around a bit more carefully, you spot something you can use; a small leather sack near the last row of bushes. It may be useful for the road ahead, as well as for carrying more berries. Slinging it over your shoulder, you turn back to Sarah.

A quick walk and you're next to the pink dragoness. "Hey, Sarah," you say, shaking her gently. "Wake up, I need to show you something." She yawns, rubs her eyes, and turns to you.

"Yes I'm awake," comes her groggy reply. "What's up? Ready to continue our journey?" she asks jokingly.

"Sure, but look at this first." You point at the sign, beckoning for her to read it. As she approaches it you enter the rows of berries and proceed to pick quite a few handfuls; mostly yellow and blue, but a couple handfuls of red ones in case you or Sarah should get hungry. Some berries are for the journey ahead, as you hope this will happen at lunch and dinner as well. By the time you're finished, the sack is nearly full of berries. You return to see Sarah looking at the rows of bushes, her head turning left and right, looking for the different kinds.

You prod her side, and are rewarded with a surprised "eep!" at the unexpected tickle. As she turns you empty the sack's contents on the ground between the two of you. Red, yellow and blue berries roll out onto the ground, creating a multicolored collage. Sarah looks at them, then at you. At first her face is creased with confusion, then it clears up as she begins to understand. She breaks into a huge, bright smile that seemed to radiate joy and happiness. "Can I really tickle you?" she asks, excited.

In answer you reach out with your claw and grab a mixture of blue and yellow berries from the ground. She looks giddy with anticipation as you swallow the berries in a single gulp, laying back on the soft green grass as you do so. You fold your arms behind your head, stick your legs straight out and spread your wings out beneath you, displaying your young red scaly body for her to tickle. From the pose it looks like you might be napping, but you know sleep will be impossible for some time.

The blue berries start to kick in soon after. It's nothing sudden, nothing drastic, just a slow subtle feeling washing through your entire body. The first sign that the berries are working comes when you can feel the inch high soft grass sway slightly against your arm. The breeze, previously unnoticeable, was barely moving the grass at all. But each sway against your skin was like a slight itch. You giggle softly when the feeling washes lower and the swaying grass slightly tickles the edges of your underarms.

Trying to itch the awkward feelings, you discover that the yellow berries are also working. You try to unfold your scaly arms to scratch, but it just can't be done. You try moving your legs, but they're paralyzed too. Even your midsection is stuck where it is. After some experimenting you conclude that the only thing you can move at all is your head, which to your surprise remains relatively free.

All this happened within less than a minute of eating the berries. Both you and Sarah stand (or lie in your case) for a few seconds in silence. There's a look of calm on your face and a look of giddiness on hers. Both of you anticipate with excitement what's about to happen. Suddenly, the silence is broken by your voice. "Alright, it worked," you inform. "Apart from my head, I cannot move at all."

Sarah literally squeals with joy and runs over to you. Kneeling beside you, she drags a claw lazily up your belly. Immediately you break into laughter, squeezing your eyes tightly. When they open you see Sarah with thoughtful stare at your exposed form. Quickly and hastily, Sarah pulls your limbs into an X on the ground, totally exposing every part of your body to her reach.

"You said you like being tickled right?" Sarah asks. She seems to have lost her shyness about tickling you from yesterday. You nod, feeling that it wouldn't be appropriate to talk in this situation. "So tell me where your worst spot is and we'll get started right away! No, wait, that wouldn't be good. I want to become the greatest tickler, and finding your weak spot will be good practice. Just tell me which half of you has your most ticklish spot, and I will find it!"

You look at her cute, joyful expression and say "My most ticklish spot is on my...
12211212.title: Sarah's Dream

122112121.content:
Sarah's face would've brightened even more had it been possible. Her radiant smile was helping you feel totally relaxed. "Now, where should I start looking?" she asks rhetorically.
"Here?" She drags a claw across your tummy, sending you into a fit of laughter.
"Or here?" A claw scrabbles in your armpit, pushing you farther into hysteria.
"Or maybe here?" With a deft flick she sends her tail deep into your belly button, shattering what little resistance you had left.

"Well, I guess we should work our way up, hmm?" Sarah wiggles her claws and reaches for your hips. Normally you'd be squirming at the sight of someone's wiggling claws, but thanks to the yellow berries you can only stare at the dragoness' descending doom. You start to wonder why you did this when Sarah's dancing claws meet your flesh.

You immediately break out in laughter, as your reflexes tell you to buck your hips. However, even reflexes are halted because of the paralysis. There is nothing you can do at all to hide or escape. All you can do is just sit there, fully exposing yourself to Sarah's torment.

Sarah, for her part, was much better than she let on. The blue berries were probably helping out a bit, but even then you could tell Sarah was a masterful tickler. Her fingers groped at your motionless hips, eliciting peals of hysterical laughter from your mouth.

Sarah's claws move a bit higher and you go silent, lapsing into a fit of silent laughter. Her nails spider dance around your belly and sides, sometimes questing deep into your navel. This drives you insane, light scratches on the inner walls and pokes on the bottom of your extremely ticklish belly button.

After several torturous minutes, Sarah's claws once again migrate upwards. They reach your ribs and decide to stay for a while, and you suspect they enjoy it there. Little sharp points delicately tracing the gaps between each rib, scratching ever so softly, making you laugh and laugh and laugh.

Her claws then reach your underarms, and you're afraid you're going insane. The sharp nails of her claws lightly spider-dance in your hollows, sometimes simply digging in for variation. You've never laughed so hard in your life.

You can tell this is where Sarah really likes tickling people, as she stares there a good deal longer than she did with any other part of your body. Eventually she does let up, and you take the opportunity to catch your breath.

When you can focus on her, Sarah smiles and ask "Now where's that tickle spot?" She returns to your hips, and even though you brace yourself you still break out laughing as soon as she starts tickling.

"Is this it?" she asks.
122112121.title: Sarah's Search

1221121212.content:
Sarah then reaches higher, and before you know it one of her nails is digging into your navel. You immediately respond, snapping your head side to side and laughing as the torturous feelings shoot up from your belly button.

Even as she starts tickling the rest of your belly and sides, she talks to you as if she wasn't making you laugh your lungs out.

"This is definitely a good spot. Is it your worst?"
1221121212.title: No?

12211212122.content:
Once again her claws return to your ribs, and once again you break out into uncontrollable laughter. The tickling seems more intense this time, as if she's getting impatient.

"Well, is this it?" she asks in a pout.
12211212122.title: Getting there?

choices: Actually, there is no one sweet spot
122112121222.content:
All too quickly Sarah's claws jump straight to your under arms, again spider-tickling in your smooth hollows. Silent laughter spills from your mouth, as you are forced to tears by the incessant and ruthless tickling. It was as if Sarah was angry at you for not telling her from the start, though she told you not to.

Still a bit worked up, Sarah tickles you hard before finally asking.

"It's here, isn't it?"
122112121222.title: Higher still

choices: "Could you tickle me a bit more?"
1221121212221.content:
"YEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHES!!!" you scream.

She nods and keeps tickling your underarms like this for 10 minutes.

When she finally stops, you're trying to catch your breath as best you can.

"Now what?" she asks.
1221121212221.title: Finally, you got there!

choices: Left with the sign that says Tickle Meadow.
Right with the sign that says path to the Cave of Endless Tickles.
Up hoping you can find the person being tickled using your flying powers.
125.content:
You realize that you are a ticklish vampire that can go out during the day and likes to get tickled. Remembering that you don't own any shirts, grass blowing in the wind lightly tickles on your stomach. You grin but the tickling isn't enough to make you laugh, even when a blade of grass pokes into your navel. you just smile and enjoy it. You hear a loud laughing in the nearby Forest Of Giggles that is just miles from the mansion. You traverse into the forest looking for where the laughing comes from when you hit a fork in the road.


Which way will you go?
125.title: No reflection after all

1252.content: I walked along the path to the Cave of Endless Tickles, and met a man along the way. "Hello," he greeted me, with a smile. "Looking for some tickles?"
1252.title: Right with the sign that says path to the Cave ...

125212.content: He noticed you wasn't following him. "Come on, what are you waiting for?"
125212.title: you stay put.

choices: You did what he told you too.
1252122.content: He leads you deeper into the cave. "Take off your shoes," he ordered. "And then sit."
1252122.title: You follow him.

12521221.content: He sat down next to you. "Now, tell me, are you ticklish?" He asked you.
12521221.title: You did what he told you too.

125212211.content: He grinned. "Good," He poked your side.
125212211.title: You nod.

13.content:
Four years of saving should now give you a month's vacation at the premier tickling resort: The Mansion.

You hear sounds coming from relatively nearby and follow them. Surprisingly, you find a limestone building and some train tracks. An enthusiastic Palmon comes out to meet you.

"Hi there, do you have a reservation for the Mansion?"

"Yes I do."

"Excellent!" she chirps. "I just need to take your picture for an ID card. Security is very tight, you understand. If you could step against that wall."

In under five minutes, she has taken the picture and produced a card from reservation information. She gives you the card, which sports a surprisingly good picture. Unfortunately, there is typo.

"I'm sorry, but it should say..."
13.title: Check In

14.content:
Being tickled looks like so much fun, but you don't seem to be in the least bit ticklish. Hopefully someone at the mansion can make you ticklish.

"Hey, you goin' to the mansion?" asks a fairly large tiger that you somehow missed before.

"Yes, I am."

"Well, if you want a traveling companion, come on. I know the road can get lonely. What are you supposed to be, anyways?"

So, you introduce yourself as...
14.title: Off to see the wizard

141.content: "Could have fooled me." he says. "You look pretty ticklish." "But I'm not." you reply. Well, I could take you there." he offered. You say...
141.title: He can take you there...

1411.content:
"Okay" you answered. "Sweet.Here we go" He says as he picks you up and starts speeding down the road. You can feel the wind brush by your face in his slightly muscular arms.
Suddenly you stop as he puts you down......
1411.title: Thanks!

1412.content: "Okay, it's your choice, little buddy." he replies. You had never really liked being called little, but you decided to ignore it. You started running, the wolf easily keeping up with you.
1412.title: On the way...

144.content: You say you're Mickey Mouse, but honestly, is that really true?
144.title: Are you really Mickey Mouse?

choices: No, no, that's not true either.
1442.content:
Ok, ok, instead you're a Catgirl named Misha. You're about 5'5", and look like a regular human. Well, except for the pointed cat ears on your head instead of human ones, and a long tail swishing behind you. You've got chin length black hair that matches your black tail, tanned skin, and yellow cat eyes that see very well, especially in the dark. You're a athletic, healthy girl with a smooth, toned stomach and not an inch of baby fat one you, something you pride yourself in. You're wearing your normal outfit of a black sleeveless tank top that only comes down to your lowest ribs, exposing your svelte midriff and smooth underarms completely. You're also wearing a pair of black jeans that hang low on your hips with a wide belt, and a pair of running shoes.

This outfit would definitely get you into a lot of ticklish situations, except for the fact that you are totally, completely unticklish. Your friends have always tried to tickle you over the years, and haven't gotten as much as a smile out of you. Then you got them back and tickled them into a giant giggle fit. You were always envious of your friends being ticklish; being tickled seemed like a lot of fun. In fact, you suspected that a lot of people tried to tickle you because they knew it wouldn't work and you'd tickle them back. But no one ever managed to find even the tiniest tickle spot on you.

But now that you're an adult and are moving out of your parents' home, you decided to head to Bing's Tickle Mansion. You've heard they know everything about tickling there, and surely someone should be able to make you as ticklish as you ever wanted to be, and give you an awesome ticklish experience.
1442.title: No, I was just joking

choices: Stop tickling, and try to figure out where to go.
14421.content:
You've finally arrived at the Tickle Mansion, your cat tail swishing nervously behind you. You decide to ring the bell at the side of the front gate, oddly shaped like a feather. "I guess that makes sense for a tickle mansion" you think to yourself. To your surprise, the doorbell doesn't make a sound, but instead automatically opens the gates. Deciding you'd better head inside, you walk into the front room. It looks like a reception area, with someone who looks like a secretary standing behind a computer at a desk in the middle of the room, with a number of doors along the walls.

Taking a closer look at the secretary, you notice she's not entirely human either. In fact, she appears to be at least part bird! A pair of feathery blue wings sprout from her back like angel wings, and her hair appears to be soft downy feathers rather than normal hair. You can't see all of the rest of her, so you can't tell what other differences she has. On the whole though, she seems like a pretty bird woman, with light blue eyes and a pleasantly happy expression on her face.

"Hello there, and welcome to Bing's Tickle Mansion!" she says, noticing you looking at her. "My name is Alicia. I bet you're applying to be a ticklee, by the look of you. Just look at all those bare tickle spots!" Alicia says, suddenly hopping over the desk with a beating of her wings, carrying her to drop down, standing right in front of you. Her feathery wings stretch out in front of her and brush against your bare belly, each feather delicately stroking against your smooth skin. But you stand there stoically, not tickled at all by the sensation, actually feeling like a pleasant feathery massage.

"Hey, you're tummy isn't ticklish!" Alicia says, a very surprised look on her face. "What gives? You're showing it off like its the perfect place to tickle! You tease..." She scowls at you, as you try to explain your situation, surprised by Alicia's aggressiveness.

"Actually, that's why I've come to the tickle mansion." You tell her. "I'm not ticklish at all, and I've always wanted to know what it feels like. I thought that someone here might be able to help me! Oh, uh... I'm Misha, by the way. I didn't get to say so earlier."

Alicia looks even more surprised now. "What? Not ticklish at all? No way! I need to see for myself, raise those arms of yours. I bet those armpits of yours are ticklish!"

You do as she says, stretching your arms over your head, revealing your bare underarms and stretching out your tummy as well. With a last wistful look at your belly, Alicia brings up her arms this time, scritching her fingernails under your arms. She draws zigzags and explores as much of your underarms as she can, but you don't even smile or flinch. It doesn't tickle at all. But Alicia has a determined look in her baby blues, and you realize you'll have to stop her on your own. You bring your arms down and grab her sides in retaliation, playfully lobster pinching a path from her ribs down to her hips. Alicia's response is instant, immediately backing up a step and breaking into giggles, trying to bat you away with her hands and wings.

Part of you wants to keep on tickling Alicia. She's obviously ticklish, and maybe you should teach her a lesson for even trying to tickle you out of the blue like that. Then again, maybe you should just get down to business and try to find a way to make yourself ticklish.
14421.title: Yep, I'm Misha!

choices: You have to undergo tickle-testing to ensure you're being truthful...
You take a tour of the facility.
144211.content:
Smiling -smirking, really- at how easy this is, you shift your weight forwards, in turn forcing the off-balance avian backwards, your dextrous fingers squeezing all the while. In seconds, you have her down and propped against the desk, squirming and squealing as your hands roam over her sides, not hindered in the least by the white jacket clothing her torso.
         "Ohononho! Wait! Waitwaitwaitwaitwait! Not there! Ahahahahah!" She pleads, the laughter and comic situation combining to make her tone sound positively playful.
         "Oh, don't play innocent here; what were you expecting when you tried to tickle me like that?" You coo, pressing in close, letting your weight add force to your probing. Her greatest outbursts occur, you soon realize, whenever you near her belly, and you soon slide your determined fingers under the fabric of her top and against the soft skin on her abdomen.

         "Wow. You are really ticklish!" You exclaim seconds later, as poor Alicia falls to the side, laughing silently and trying to crawl away while holding a tight fetal position. "I only point it out in case you didn't realize it." You add, smiling before slowly retracting your hand. You are certain to leave a few skitters with your fingernails behind as a parting gift as you remove the appendage.

         Alicia lays down on the carpet for a few seconds, before getting back to her feet with surprising speed. You assume that a combination of bird-like lungs and being used to it by now -given her current location- may have something to do with it.
         "That (whew), that was really unfair (giggle)." She pants, staggering back behind the desk. "But, I think that you're going to do great here (hehe). After a a zap in the Ticklemiser, " She eyes your bare belly greedily. "...Well, you'll never view your own body the same way again. Here, let me sign you in. Now you said your name was Misha?..."
144211.title: Keep tickling the birdgirl

choices: They confirm you aren't ticklish at all.
Dr. Ticklov finds a tickle spot!
1442111.content:
Alicia signs you in, and gestures for you to follow her down the hall. You walk past rows of shut doors, the only thing unique about them is a number on each one. Presumably, the people here know which door is which, but it looks incredibly easy to get lost in this wing of the building. You also notice that you don't hear a thing.

"Hey, its so quiet in here. Are we the only people in here?" you ask Alicia as she takes a turn down a different hall, past even more doors.

"Hmm? Oh no, not at all!" she tells you, smiling a little at your question. "Its just that all these rooms are completely sound proofed. You understand that in can get pretty loud in some of them… oh! We're here. Dr. Ticklov's lab. C'mon!" Alicia opens the door to room E14396 (like you'll ever remember that if you need it) and you step into a large room. On one side of the room is a large machine with a chair placed in its center, with elaborate computer screens and dials on either side. The chair has straps in a number of places… ankles, thighs, wrists, shoulders. The other end of the room looks like a high school chemistry class. Flasks and beakers of brightly colored liquids line a long table, all like scientific notations you can't begin to figure out. At least, not with the quick glace you get.

At a desk in the back of the room is a woman. She appears to be in her early 20s, with long fiery red hair tied in a braid around her head. She's wearing a long white lab coat that goes down to her feet, adorned with black boots. Similar black gloves cover her hands. You can only see her head, but she appears to be completely human, which is something of a surprise in this part of the world.

Alicia walks up to the red headed woman, who looks up at the two of you with pale green eyes. "Dr. Ticklov, we've got a girl here who could use your help." Alicia turns to you and introduces you. "This is Misha, and she's completely unticklish. She was hoping someone here could help with that, and if anyone can, I'm sure it's you Doctor. Misha, this is Dr. Ticklov, she's our resident expert on a lot of things."

"Completely unticklish? Forgive me if I'm skeptical Alicia." Dr. Ticklov says, in a confident voice that has a soft Russian accent.

"Believe it, Doctor. I tested it out, myself!" Alicia tells her.

The doctor gets up to shake your hand, just as you blurt out "You're really an expert? You seem too young!"

"Child prodigy." Dr. Ticklov tells you curtly. "I assure you, I'm well qualified. Before we begin any treatment for your unfortunate condition…" the Doctor pauses slightly as she says this, and you can see her eyes quickly steal a glance at your bare belly. You grin at this glimpse of humanity from the otherwise steely Russian scientist. "…uh, we must thoroughly test to make sure you do not already have any tickle spots. Otherwise, the results of the treatment could be… intense."

Dr. Ticklov walks over to the chair and machine. "Come, sit down. This won't take long. And if you are truly unticklish, it will go quite quickly." You shrug at her and walk over to sit down in the chair, as Dr. Ticklov straps you in. You're pretty confident she won't find any tickle spots, everyone you know has been trying for years. But you can understand her skepticism. Then again, maybe she just wants a chance to try and tickle you herself. That wouldn't be a first for you, either.

As the test begins...
1442111.title: Tickle testing, just to be sure.

14421111.content:
The doctor takes a seat to one side of the device, pressing ominous buttons and reading vague dials. You swear you can feel the machine warming up, preparing to unleash who-knew-what on you in an attempt to unearth a tickle spot. Obviously something requiring the subject to be highly restrained.

         The device hums, then whirrs, then clicks, vibrates and gives off a bright light. Ticklov exclaims in surprise-...And then nothing. She stands up and walk over to face you, still restrained, gazing at you as if she doesn't know what kind of emotion would do for the moment. Eventually, she settles on nonplussed.

         "That is... Unfortunate. The nerve scan reveals your touch receptors are all incorrectly placed to read ticklish stimuli... You really are medically incapable of being tickled!" Her expression shifts. She seems almost angry to hear this. "I have to fix this. No one should be completely un-ticklish. It's a travesty." She mutters. In turn, you frown. It seems as if people around here consider a lack of ticklishness to be on par with a disease, which you find slightly and vaguely insulting.

         'I could have told you that. Now, can I get out of here?" You ask, tugging at one arm-band.

         "Oh, certainty. Alicia, grab that lever there, would you?" The bird-girl acquiesces, and your bindings slide away. "Now, I can think of two ways off the top of my head to make you ticklish. One, you would put on a full-body suit that I've designed. The interior is completely lined with feathers that are designed to be highly receptive to static electricity; the slightest movement makes them stand up and brush against the triggering body part. It's meant for use on repeat offenders who've broken Mansion rules, teaching them a lesson while letting them go about their duties," The edge of her pretty mouth curves up. "Indeed, I remember prescribing one to Alicia quite some time ago. She got quite the laugh out of it."
         Alicia doesn't answer, but unconsciously covers her sides protectively and shudders, wings twitching.
         "What I can do," the doctor continues. "Is modify one to instead massage in a special gel I've created for just such emergencies as this. It'll stimulate cell growth and eventual ought to make you ticklish, as well as improving your sense of touch. It's less intensive than the other procedure I could try, which would be to fully submerge you in a tank of the same gel-ly stuff and run a light electric current through it to speed up the process. Unfortunately, while it would be quick, it would mean that your first experience with tickling could be overpoweringly strong."
14421111.title: Pseudoscience! Pseudoscience for everyone!

choices: Ask Alicia to keep you company.
Catnap. The sooner this suit stuff is over, the better!
144211112.content:
While you're excited to be made ticklish, and the prospect of a quick session fixing everything was enticing, you decide that a slower process would probably be better for you. You're not sure how you'd adapt to being tickling, and going at it in stages is probably for the best. A bath in electric goo also sounds pretty gross.

"I think I'll go with the body suit, Dr. Ticklov." you tell her hesitantly. That one doesn't sound like a lot of fun either, to be honest. You never liked wearing a ton of clothing. And this one would be filled with gel? That also sounds a little gross.

"Very well." says Dr. Ticklov curtly. "This will give me an excellent chance to try out the suit. You will be its first subject. I'm looking forward to collecting all sorts of useful data." Dr. Ticklov's eyes seem to glaze over, as if she's thinking about a million things at once, as she leaves the room to go get the suit. You sit in the examination chair awkwardly, not knowing what to do with yourself while the doctor gets the suit.

"So, Alicia… you were put in some kind of feather suit? What was that like?" you ask Alicia, who also seems to be milling around. You get the sense that she's procrastinating going back to her desk, but you're not one to call her out on it.

"Oh, it tickled so much!" Alicia tells you, shivering at the memory. "The worst part is, the won't tickle you if you stand perfectly still. But that's so hard! Every time you move, it tickles! Which make you move, and it tickles more! Even laughing was enough to make my tummy shake, which tickled and tickled… oohhh…" Alicia trails off, appearing to vividly remember the experience. Not being ticklish, you can't sympathize with her at all. Although the idea of the tickle suit does make you curious. What would it be like to be in that thing? Maybe you'll get to find out eventually, if Dr. Ticklov's treatment works.

And just as you have that thought, Dr. Ticklov returns with a cart, the tickle suit laying on it. It appears to cover most of the body, stopping tightly at wrists, ankles, and neck. There appear to be boots that you put on separately. Thoughtfully, there even seems to be a spot cut out for your tail.

"Alright, here it is. Take off those clothes and put this on. I want you to wear it for the rest of the day and through the night. Tomorrow you can take it off and we can run another test." Dr. Ticklov tells you, motioning for you to change.

"W-wait, change right here? In front of you?" you ask, blushing.

"We're all women here, Misha. Besides, I am a doctor. There should be nothing to be ashamed about. Nonetheless, if it bothers you, I can ask Alicia to leave." Dr. Ticklov tells you, impatiently. With a shrug, you decide not to make a big deal out of it and change. You slip off your clothing and put it on the lower level of the cart, and grab the body suit. Putting on the suit nude feels like a weird thing to do, but there isn't any point in getting your underwear all gel-ified. Besides, the suit needs to be against as much skin as possible, right?

You put your legs in the suit, which fits you snugly. How did Dr. Ticklov know your size? Does she have more of these than she lets on, or was this just a perfect coincidence? However, you don't have time to wonder that, as you zip the suit up tight, you feel the gel press against you. Its… slimy. It’s a very weird sensation.

"Ew… I feel really gross." you blurt out. "Like I need to take a shower." You move around a bit experimentally, the squishy feeling of the gel against your skin with every movement. It doesn't tickle, and you can't feel it being rubbed in or anything, but its definitely pressed against you tightly. Your ears droop at the thought of having to be in this for a whole day.

You swear you hear the doctor sigh slightly. "There's nothing to be uncomfortable about. The gel is perfectly sanitary. It simply needs to be against your skin for a prolonged period. With such an extreme case as yours, I'm not sure how quickly the gel will cause ticklishness. Tickle spots may also appear unevenly across your body. That's one of the reasons we need to run another test tomorrow. If the gel does not work at all, I have a few more ideas I can try. Liquid medicine to be taken orally, perhaps in combination with hypnosis therapy…" the doctor trails off, thinking for a moment. "But that's nothing to be concerned about now. Misha, please put on the boots now."

You shake your head. You feel gross enough without squishing in slime every step! "No! Please, I feel icky enough as it is! I don't want to squish around all day! Plus I can't sleep with boots on anyway!" You plead with the doctor.

"Very well," the doctor responds, her features softening slightly. "We can take this in stages. But your feet will not become ticklish this way, just so you know. But you must be tired after all this, and making it here. I'll have your clothing sent to your room. Alicia, please accompany Misha to her room."

Alicia nods, and gestures for you to follow her, as she takes you to your room. The corridors wind until you make it to a different wing, where you're shown a nice and spacious room for yourself.

"Hmm," Alicia says, thoughtfully. "Would you like to just turn in early today, or would you like some company for a while?"
144211112.title: The Tickle-Gel Suit

choices: Carry right on tickling -will the suit suddenly take affect?
Let her up to talk some more.
Someone interrupts you. (Dr. Ticklov, with a proviso?)
1442111121.content:
"I'm still new here," You say rather hesitantly. "Would you mind keeping me company for a bit?"

"Not at all," Says the bird girl with a smile, following you in. "That receptionist job is always so boring at this time of day." The suite is actually quite nice, you quickly decide. A short hallway with a bathroom to the right leads into a tiled kitchenette, the counter serving as one border to a spacious and tasteful sitting room. A bay window with a glorious ocean view and the elegantly vaulted ceiling combine to make the space seem even larger than it already is, handily preventing the couch and massage-chair set before the impressive hearth from making it feel stuffy.

"Welcome to the Mansion." Says Alicia proudly. "Nice, isn't it? My room's only a little ways down the hall from here, if you want to ask me something." She plops herself down on the cushions in the bay window, wings folded primly behind her. "Like, seriously, talk to me. I need an excuse to get out of the foyer for a while."

"Is signing people into the Mansion really that bad?" You take a seat next to her, too busy enjoying the crystalline water beyond the cliffs outside and the warm sun sparkling over them to let the suit get you down. "I'd have thought it'd be interesting, getting to see the kinds of people who come through here."

"Oh it is," Says Alicia conversationally. "But most of them are tickle-freaks of some kind or another. If you watched me in action for a few days, you'd see that when I leaped the desk and tickled you, it really wasn't that presumptuous compared to what a lot of people do. It's why they prefer to hire avians for the desk jobs; we need the endurance, ticklish as I am."

"So, why'd you come to the mansion?" You grin wolfishly. "You're so ticklish, I'd have thought you'd try and do anything to avoid a place like this."

"I am not that ticklish!" She says playfully. "But, now that you mention it, I guess I just have an interest in tickling from when I was younger. My friends and family would tickle me all the time to make me do things for them. And when I got older, I always had to be on my guard whenever I wore a shirt that showed off my belly, like what you were wearing earlier. People wouldn't leave me alone." She shrugs her wings. "At first, I hated it, but I learned to get used to it and even like it over time."

"I'm something of the opposite," You say, reclining against the wall. "Most of the people I knew were, ticklish, but, obviously," You run a hand down the leathery side of the suit, making a face as gel squelches against you. "I'm not. People would try to tickle me, but I usually just ended up tickling them back. It was so funny, seeing them curl up, laughing and laughing, that eventually I decided I wanted to see what if felt like."

"Well, Dr. Ticklov should be able to do that easily enough. You can always count on the Doc." She leans forward, giving one sleeve of your garment a tug. "Is it working yet?"

"No," You shake, ears perking up as an idea comes to you. It merely seems appropriate, given the location. "But you said that these things tickle when they move -hey, were you trying to tickle me?" You glare at her in mock anger, expression stern in fictitious outrage.

"What? No, I was merely testing to see-" She squirms under your glare, wings fluttering.

"-If I was ticklish. You know what that means, when you try to tickle me?" Before she can answer, you leap forward, grabbing her wrists as she raises them to defend herself. Apparently having suspected a tickle-attack any minute, she puts up a struggle. With some grunting and struggling, you both roll off the ledge, landing on the carpet in a burst of feathers. "That I get to tickle you!" You answer yourself as you gain the upperhand.

Downy blonde hair tousled and blue eyes lit, the Avian glares up at you, defiant look at odds with the way you have her wrists neatly pinioned to the carpet out to either side of her head.
"The thing about this position," She says, with obviously enforced calm. "Is that you have to let up one of my arms to do anything, and that's all I need."

"Do I know?" You ask contemplatively, eyeing the base of her top, jostled by the brief struggle and showing a faint line of pale skin. You stare at it predatorily, out of the corner of your eye watching her goggle as your great fluffy tail sinuously hovers into position next to your head.

Quick as a striking snake, you flick it neatly under her shirt, swirling the fuzzy appendage back and forth. You smile down at her as she bursts into laughter, twisting back and forth, trying to free her hands from your grasp. Wings thrum out a tattoo on the carpet as she squirms, legs kicking, and you grin all the wider as you nose your tail right into her navel.

"Heyhehyehey! Hey! That's not fair! Ahahahahahahahah! Lemme go! Ahahahahhaahahaha"
1442111121.title: Ask Alicia to Keep you Company.

choices: Go to the Assistant's Office first
144212.content:
You reluctantly stop tickling her, figuring you've gotten her to snap out of her tickle attack. "There, I told you, I'm not at all ticklish. Now will you help me out, or do I need to get you some more?" you tell her, as she recovers from the tickling, catching her breath.

"Aah, I'd love to see how good of a tickler you are, you seem like you might be good enough to work here even..." Alicia says, as if making a hard decision. "But I'm not allowed to let myself be tickled while I'm working. I'm the receptionist, not ticklee number one! Now... you are a special case. I think you'll have to see Dr. Ticklov. She works on all kinds of experiments. Usually I think they're about making someone already ticklish even more sensitive, but I think she might have some ideas for you. She's on the second floor, the door with her name on it."

You thank Alicia for her help, and start heading up the stairs. Just as your about to leave the room, Alicia stops you. "If you want to play some more, I'm free tonight." Alicia whispers to you, low enough that you're sure no one else would hear. "I live in the dorms in the west wing, apartment 432. If you stay in the mansion, you're welcome to drop by!"

You blush and say you might, realizing you might have already made your first friend here. And, you think, it would probably be fun to tickle her some more later. You barely tickled her at all just then, and she's probably ticklish on more than her sides. And if you can actually become ticklish, those bird wings would probably be a great way to be tickled for one of the first times. You smile to yourself just thinking about it, and head up to the second floor.

Wandering down the hall, you see Dr. Ticklov's name on a sign at a large door to your left. On your right is another door labelled 'Assistant's Office." You know you should do straight to the good doctor, but part of you wants to take the detour and ask the assistant what the doctor is like first. What to do?
144212.title: Which door?

1442121.content:
Thinking that the doctor would be too busy to see you, you knock on the Assistant's office door.

*Knock knock* "come in" comes a female voice so opening the door, you see a woman sitting behind a desk.

"Hi there, can I help you?"

Stepping in you close the door, "yeah I was hoping to see Dr. Ticklov but I don't want to interrupt her".
The assistant stands up and walks over to you "I see, are you here to become more sensitive to tickling?"

"Well I'm here because I'm not ticklish and I was hoping she could make me ticklish" the assistant looks at you "really?, not even a little ticklish?"

You shake your head "no, not one bit" she then walks around you looking at your body "I find that hard to believe, everyone is ticklish!"

"Not me and that's why I'm here" she stops in front of you "lets say you're not ticklish, would you be willing to let me find out?". Since she was like the receptionist, you decide to let her "sure, go ahead"

The assistant smiles "this will be fun, I never usually get a chance to tickle" she looks around the office "here, sit in my chair".

Pulling up the chair, you sit down "put your arms on the armrests". Doing as she asks, you place them on the armrests and watch her tie your wrists using some rope. Then using some more rope, she ties your legs together before getting a spare chair and sitting down propping your feet on her lap.

"I have a theory that people who show off parts of their body aren't that ticklish there". She pulls off your shoes revealing your feet. "So because I wear shoes, you think my feet are going to be ticklish".

"That's right, now lets see" she drags a finger across your sole seeing if you'll react. "Nothing yet, maybe if I....." she starts tickling your feet more vigorously hoping you'll start laughing but just like everyone else you has tried, you stay silent.

"Come on, that has to tickle" as she was scratching at your soles, you could see she was becoming frustrated with your lack of response.

Seeing that your soles weren't getting her anywhere, she moves onto your toes. "Now these look awfully ticklish" you shrug your shoulders "if that's what you want to believe"

Trying to figure out if you're bluffing or not, she reaches over a grabs a feather off the desk. "Feathers are my favorite, even the slightest touch can reduce a person to laughter". Using the feather on and in between your toes, she was getting so frustrated that she uses the quill of the feather to stab your foot.

"OW! WHAT THE HELL, THAT HURT!" not sharp enough to draw blood, but hard enough to hurt, you start pulling at your restraints "let me out of here you psycho!". It was then the office door opens and in walks a blonde haired woman. "What on earth is going on?

"Dr. Ticklov, I was......uhhhhhh" "why is she tied up in your chair?". The assistant began to panic "I was just seeing if she was ticklish". Dr Ticklov looks at you "I heard you shout" "she stabbed my foot with that feather quill because I didn't laugh".

She walks over to you and proceeds to untie you from the chair. "Heather, what did I tell you if you did something like this again?"

Heather whimpers "you said I'd be punished". Having been untied, you look at your foot "ow, this really hurts"

Dr. Ticklov groans in anger "Heather you've crossed the line this time, tying up someone who's here for some assistance and you hurt them" she shakes her head before walking to the desk and dialing for reception

"Hello reception!" Alicia says "Alicia, its Dr Ticklov I need you to bring 2 security guard with you to my assistant's office please" "of course Dr. Ticklov".

After a few minutes, Alicia and 2 huge security guards enter the room. "Guards can you take Heather here to Room 4 please, I think she need a thorough going over" Heather gasps "No please not Room 4 anything but that". The 2 guards carry her out of the room before walking down the hallway all the while she screams her protests.

"I'm sorry about her hurting you, she's done something like this before"

"That's okay, I'm just glad she didn't use a pen or something sharper". Looking at your foot again, you look up at Dr. Ticklov seeing her smile.

"How would you like to see her punishment as a way of revenge?". Hearing that suggestion, you smile "that would be fun to watch".

"Or we could get down to the reason on why you're here?" "its up to you".


What's it to be? Heather's Punishment or Misha
1442121.title: The Assistant's Office

14421211.content:
"I'd like to see her get what she deserves" you say "okay then, please follow me". Putting your shoes back on, you follow the doctor as well as the protests of Heather as she's carried down the hallway "this Room 4 that she hates........what exactly is in there that's so bad?". Dr. Ticklov smiles at you "wait and see". Arriving at Room 4, you enter it just as Heather is being restrained on a metal frame under a large metal box and you notice one of the guards remove her shoes leaving her barefooted "thank you gentlemen".

The 2 guards leave the room, closing the door as they do "this is Room 4" Dr. Ticklov says as Heather struggles in her restraints. "Years of research and countless testing have brought us to this" she says pointing to a large piece of machinery. "This right here is in my mind the smartest computer ever!" even though Dr. Ticklov was sounding very pleased, you couldn't see why it was such a big deal "not to insult you doctor.......but what's so great about it?".

She smiles at you "I'll show you". At that point, Heather starts protesting again "no please doctor, I've learned my lesson". Sitting down at the desk, she starts typing at the keyboard before hitting enter. "Hello Amy" "Hello Doctor" you jump at the sound of the voice "who was that?" "that was the computer". You look at the screen "you named it Amy?" "actually she named herself........Amy could you upload the profile named Heather please". "Of course Doctor" you could see why Dr. Ticklov was so proud of the computer "the Heather profile is uploaded".

"Excellent.......now Amy I'd like you to initiate Phase 4" "WHAT, NO ARE YOU KIDDING ME??!!" Heather shouts "Phase 4 initiating". Just then several mechanical hands appear from the metal box below Heather "Amy's a computer that tickles basically. She has profiles of everyone who has been in this building. To make a profile, she scans the person to find their spots" you nod understanding by what's talking about. "Finding a person's weak spots, she then uses the best techniques to get the most out of them.......so to speak".

You watch in amazement as 2 hands pull back Heather's toes making the soles taut then 2 other hands tickle her feet. Then at the other end, 2 hands are attacking her underarms bring out the most tortured laughter you've ever heard "HAHAHAHAHHAA PLEASE STOP IT HAHAHAHAHAHHA I HATE IT". Heather was already crying with laughter as the hands attacked her with expert precision. "In about 2 minutes, she'll be out cold" Dr. Ticklov was correct with her estimate as Heather passed out at exactly 2 minutes "wow.......that looked intense". The same 2 guards from earlier entered and removed Heather before walking out "so Misha.......you want a try?".

"Yeah sure but that would be a waste of time since it wouldn't affect me". "Lets see shall we?" leading you to the frame, you climb onto the frame before she straps you in place and removes your shoes "this should be interesting to watch" Dr. Ticklov says as she walks away from you. She sits down at the desk "Amy, we have a new profile to set up" "of course Doctor, is this staff or patients?" "Patients" the lights in the room changed from white to blue. "Male or Female?" "Female Amy, she's a catgirl" the blue lights then turn to pink "Doctor what's up with the lights?" "they change every so often, nothing to be alarmed about".

"What does the patient need Doctor?" "unfortunately Misha is not ticklish" "the name Misha has been stored.......I'll begin a scan". A green beam suddenly drops down from above and slowly moves over you from head to toe "body scan complete". "Excellent......what are the results Amy?" "the scan shows there are no areas on the body that show a rate ticklishness". "Tell me something I don't know" you say "I can begin a complete remapping of her body Doctor?" "whoa hold on, a remapping?".

"To put it plainly, she can make you ticklish" your eyes widen "really? I can be ticklish?" "yes but I'll need to know if there are any parts of your body you want to be more ticklish" "well I want my whole body to be ticklish but my belly, sides and ribs to be more ticklish". Dr Ticklov nods "let me just put that information in and the remapping can begin". After a few minutes of typing then lights fade "are you ready Misha?" you nod "you bet I am". "Amy begin remapping" the process lasted for 5 minutes and at the end you was left with the question.

Did the remapping work?
14421211.title: Heather's Punishment!!

14421212.content:
Although it would be fun to see Heather get what's coming to her, you came here for one thing "I'm sure she won't mind if we miss her punishment" Dr. Ticklov smiles "as you wish now lets go to my office".

Following her into her office, you sit down while she sits behind her desk. "So my dear, what can I help you with?".

"Well I'm hoping you could help me, you see I'm not ticklish". Dr. Ticklov nods "I see and you want to be ticklish" you nod "yes, I get......jealous sometimes and I want to know what everyone else feels".

She smiles at you "I think we'll be able to help" you get excited at this "that's great".

"Now first I'm going to need to scan your body" "any reason why?".

"Its just to see if you really aren't ticklish or there's a spot you don't know about" she reaches into her desk and pulls out a contraption.

"I'm guessing that will scan me?" she nods "yes, now if you could stand up".

As you stand up, she walks around her desk "I'm going to need you to raise your arms" doing as she asks, you raise your arms "just keep still, this won't take a moment". She moves the scanner from head to toe then does the same behind you. "There we go, take a seat and we can take a look at your image".

Sitting back down, you watch Dr.Ticklov connect the scanner to the computer "okay lets see what we've got".

With the computer facing away from you, you couldn't see what she was looking at "so what's the verdict?"

"Well you're right, there aren't any signs on your body that you're ticklish.......a first for me". This makes you nervous "will you still be able to help me?"

"Oh of course, its no problem" you sigh in relief "okay so what's first?"

"Well there are 2 options, the first is a gel that you apply to your body and gradually over time your body will be come more responsive. It takes more time but you get the same results" you nod "and the other option?".

"An injection, its fast acting and you only need the one" you smile "I'm not exactly patient so I think the injection".

"Excellent". Going into the desk drawer, she pulls out a large needle making you gulp "wow that's big". "One of the reasons why most go for the gel."

As she prepares the syringe, you watch her fill it with a liquid "is that the stuff that will make me ticklish"

"In a way yes but because you had no signs of any tickle spots, I'm going to need to increase the strength".

"Okay.......oh that reminds me, is it possible to make specific parts of my body ticklish more than other areas?"

"Of course, is there a certain area you want more ticklish?. Maybe your upper body like armpits, belly or on your lower body such as you feet or thighs?


Which should Misha choose? Upper body or Lower body
14421212.title: Misha's Treatment

144212121.content:
"I've always wanted to be more ticklish on my upper body preferably on my belly" Dr. Ticklov nods "we can do that, first lets gets the injection over and done with". She walks over to you "this is going to sting a little" you nod then look away as she pushes the needle into your arm.

"Ow" you whimper as it pushes in "just hold still for a second" as soon as the needle went in , it came out again "there we go all done".

"Wow, so will I have to wait long for this to kick in?" "just a few minutes, meanwhile lets sort out where you want to be more ticklish" you nod.

"Okay so my armpits I want......like a level up" Dr. Ticklov nods "I see so your ribs would be a level up from that and so on".

"Yeah exactly". She walks over to a large cabinet, opening it before taking out a metal case "this is what we'll need". Putting the case down on the desk, she opens it revealing a number of jars.

"What we have here are gels that intensify as they get higher so 1 would be the lowest and 10 is the highest. They're also fast acting and permanent". Looking at her jars, you could only imagine hat they'd do to you.

"What level did you inject me with?"

"That would Level 5, most would get Level 3"

"So I'm already 2 levels higher" Dr Ticklov smiles "that's right and with these jars you'll probably end up being one of the most ticklish"

Liking the sound of that, you smile "so what's next?"

"Well we can skip Level 6 and move onto Level 7 for your armpits"

Picking up the Level 7 jar, she takes off the lid "oh almost forgot" she puts on some white latex gloves "can't have my hands become ticklish".

Coming around to your side she instructs you to stand up "I'm going to need you to take off your top, I'm going to need all access" nodding you remove your top "excellent now lift your arms".

As she applies the gel to your armpits, you feel something within your body like a shock to your system which makes you start to squirm.

"I think we're starting to results" Dr. Ticklov comments seeing your reactions and can't help teasing you "tickle tickle".

Giving your armpit a tickle, you laugh and jump around "hahahahaha oh my god hahahaha".

Having applied the gel to your armpits, she moves onto your ribs "time for those ribs".
