Picking up the next jar, she applies a substantial amount of gel to your ribs which again causes you to laugh.

"Hahahahaha this is hahahaha so weird". These new sensations you were experiencing was so exhilarating for you, that you was becoming aroused which didn't go unnoticed by Dr. Ticklov.

"Sounds like someone is enjoying themselves." She tickles your ribs more making you laugh uncontrollably until she feels its time to move.

With your sides and belly, they got the same treatment and soon she was done. "We just need to wait so the gels can take full effect".

You nod while trying to regain your breath "I never knew being ticklish was like that".

"Intense isn't it?" "very". After a few minutes of waiting, Dr. Ticklov stands up from her chair "now we're going to need to do some testing to see if the gels have done their job so you have 2 choices, we can either do the tests in here or we can go to a room for some real tickling"

Being tickled for the first time, doing the tests in here would be best but wanting to see how these gels did, a real good tickling might just be it.

The office or a purpose built tickle room?
144212121.title: Upper Body of course!

1442121212.content:
With your new ticklish body, how could you miss a chance to be tickled in a room that's specifically built for that purpose.

"Seeing as there's an actual room for tickling, I'll go for the room". Dr. Ticklov smiles "excellent now if you'll like to follow me". Quickly putting your top back on, you follow her down the hallway "is the room we're going to, the same as the one Heather is in?".

"Heather is on the lower floor, that's where all employees go if they break the rules". She looks at you "think of it as a futuristic dungeon of sorts".

Turning a corner, you follow Dr. Ticklov up some stairs "so what's the room I'm going to be tickled in like?".

"Comforting yet scientific......if that's possible". Stopping outside a door, the doctor turns to you "ready?" nodding she opens the door.

Walking in, you're amazed at amount of equipment that surrounds a padded metal X-frame in the center of the room. "Wow this is incredible".

"Glad to see you're impressed, a lot of work went into this room". Stopping by the X-frame, a shiver runs through you "do you want me on this?". "Yes but we'll get to that in a bit, first I want you to know what's going to happen".

You stand by the X-frame as Dr. Ticklov explains everything. "What you see in this room, all these computers, all this equipment, everything you see makes what we hope is the ultimate machine". "The walls, ceiling and floor are sound proof, through there into that room is where all of this is controlled". Looking through the glass window, all you can see is a few controls.

"That's where I'll be sitting through the duration of the session". Looking back at her, you smile "well I'm ready" "just a moment, there's still some information you need to know".

"The machine will go through a testing procedure where it will explore your body building up a profile. From there, it will give the most effective methods to give you the best experience".

"Okay, sounds good......is there anything else I need to know?" "yes you'll need to be in your underwear for the session".

Nodding you quickly remove you clothes before giving them to Dr. Ticklov "excellent now if you could climb up onto the X-frame".

Climbing onto it, you lay down stretching your arms and legs out getting into position. "Seems like you've done this before" Dr. Ticklov says as she approaches you. "Just anxious to start".

Restraining your legs at the knees and ankles, she gives your feet a quick tickle getting a squeal and a giggle out of you. "You're going to enjoy this.... I can tell". Doing the same for your arms, she straps up your wrists and biceps. "How are they?, too tight?.....too loose?"

You try to pull your arms down and your legs up but the won't move an inch "doesn't look like I'm going anywhere". Dr. Ticklov smiles down at you and starts tickling you armpits "hahahahaha hey stop hahahahaha" her fingers spider tickling your armpits, all you could do was laugh.

"The machine can't have all the fun". Trying to bring your arms down, you laugh helplessly as she increases the speed "HAHAHAHHAA NO PLEASE HAHAHAHAHAHAHA". Your hips jerking side to side, you try to move away from her. "There's no escape kitty" her nails scratching at your armpits brings out more tortured laughter "OH MY GOD ITS TOO MUCH HAHAHAHAHAHHA".

She soon stops to let you regain your breath "with that amount of laughter from your armpits, I can only imagine what happens when your belly is tickled".

She walks away from you and into the control room "lets begin". As you lay there, the computers start to make noises which at that point, the X-frame suddenly starts to move from a horizontal position to a vertical position.

Finding yourself looking into the control room, you watch the doctor prepare the machine. "Are you ready Misha?".

Nodding, she then pushes a button which produces several robotic hands on long metal tentacle like arms but where do they start to tickle?
1442121212.title: Tickle Room

14421212121.content:
As 2 hands move toward your feet, you can't stop yourself from smiling as they wiggle their fingers teasingly until one hand strokes a single down your sole making you squeak. Both hands tease you for a few minutes getting gasps, squeaks, squeals and a giggle here and there.

The constant teasing of your newly ticklish feet was torture but fun at the same time "just think Misha, your reactions to a few pokes will be a whole lot more when they eventually tickle you silly".

It was then the teasing stopped and the hands went on full attack, scratching and poking your defenseless feet which makes you laugh but not as much as you could "hehehehehehahahahahahahaha it tickles hahahahahahahahaha". You laugh a little more as they get between your toes before stopping leaving you a little breathless.

"I think we can call that a warm up" the doctor says as she gets comfortable in her chair "things are about to get interesting". You watch as 2 hands move toward your underarms making you giggle already but it was the 2 hands that had gone for your inner thighs that made contact first. "AAAAAHAHAHAHAHA" the surprise of them tickling you there makes you scream and laugh loudly "OH MY GOHOHOHOHOHOHHAHAHAHAHAH".

As the dig away at your thighs, the hands at your underarms join in bringing out more laughter "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" thrashing around as much as your restraints would allow you, you laugh and scream jerking your body in hopes of escaping "now this is what tickling is all about" Dr Ticklov comments seemingly enjoying the show.

They tickle you mercilessly, only stopping for a few seconds to give you some time to breath before going back on the attack. As the hands at your underarms slowed down, the ones at your thighs had stopped and moved away leaving you to giggle from the underarm tickling.

"Having fun Misha?" you nod through the giggles showing her you was loving every second "good I just hope you have enough breath for what comes next". As the hands at your underarms freeze in place, you watch as 5 hands approach you and all of them move toward.......
14421212121.title: It can only get better

145.content:
"Well I'm Taj. You look light enough to ride on my back for a while if you still want to rest."

You gladly accept the offer and climb on.

"So what's your business up on the hill?" asks the tiger.

"I'm going to see if someone can make me ticklish."

"You're not ticklish at all? Any of you?"

"Not a bit," you sigh.

"Well, it so happens I'm going to sign on as a potions guru. I might be able to help. Get off for a moment, will you?" so, you do. Taj immediately licks straight across your belly.

"Ew, what?" you protest, trying to wipe off the spit with your fur.

"Let me see your feet," the tiger demands. So, you sit down in a nearby clearing and face your soles towards him. "Hefty. Pronounced ball, heel, and toepads. Well worn, too. Would be nice for tickling, only if." With that, he licks both feet, heel to toe. Doesn't tickle a bit, but it feels good.

"Well, I could help you out right here for free, but I don't know if i can find all the ingredients and you'll never see the mansion. Or, we could just continue on. your call, really."
145.title: Testing the waters

1451.content:
"Right Here Right Now" You say.

"Ok" Taj replies, I'll go looking for the nessesary ingredients.

Taj leaves for several minutes. You...
1451.title: Make Me Ticklish!

14511.content:
You wait awhile and you soon fall asleep.About a hour later Taj comes back with the ingredients. "Ok I got the stuff ready,now how do you want me to do this?"

You get alittle nervous,"uuuhhhhh put it on my...."
14511.title: Fall asleep

choices: As Ord, you must save Cassie
As Fox McCloud must save Krystal
15.content: You never really had the chance to tickle-torture her ever, although everyone knew she was ticklish. Apparently ticklish enough for them to capture, at least. "You could have done more," pounds the voice in your skull. But you will do more, and you will save her. You bound to your feet, full of pride. Your mission is clear:
15.title: Always the Hero

151.content:
Be strong, dragon! Cassie is probably being tormented right now, crying out your name for help. Do not let her down!

You take one bold step forward and are immediately stopped by a voice.

"Psst! Over here, big blue!" Curious, you approach the voice. What you find is a small purple dragon in the same fashion as yourself. This one is wearing a brown leather vest an a golf cap. "You don't look like you're the type to go to the mansion for fun."

"I'm not- I'm going to rescue my friend Cassie! She was kidnapped!"

"Well, they got scouts all through these woods. If they see you comin', I wouldn't like to think of the consequences."

"What should I do?"

"Well, I could always be of assistance..."
151.title: Ord's first dilemna

152.content: You are Fox McCloud, and your mission is to go rescue Krystal from the Tickle Mansion. With this in mind you continue to make your way towards the Tickle Mansion. As you walk along, you hear footsteps behind you. But before you can turn around, something hits you over the head, knocking you out. When you come to, you find yourself bound to an x-frame in some sort of cabin. You try to break free, but you can't. What's worse, is your shirt and socks and shoes are missing. Just then a door opens, and in walks...
152.title: As Fox McCloud must save Krystal

153.content: You are Hawkmon, and to be your best friend's hero is your goal. You have never been to the mansion; in fact, rumor has it that anyone that leaves their homeland to find the mansion never returns to tell the tale. This is why almost the entire world believes there is no mansion. But now, your hawk-like eyes given from your ancient ancestors pick it out, nearly 20 miles away. First stop: tickle forest." Hmmm... How to proceed..."
153.title: As Hawkmon must save Biyomon

1531.content: "I think i'll fly over it," you say, spreading out your wings. You lift into the air in seconds. After about five minutes of flying above the forest, you feel a tug on your foot. As you look back to see what it is, you are knocked out cold in mid-flight...
1531.title: Fly over it

15311.content: Your vision is blurry. As it comes into focus, you look down: you are tied up with vines. You appear to be inside of a tree trunk, with a single torch inside. How the tree has not burned down yet, you do not know. A strange plant thing walks in a small hatch. When you take a closer look, you begin to think of this: if you cross a sneasel (pokemon) with a native American, then colored it green, that's it would look like. You try to break free of your bonds, but they remain firm. It walks up to you and shouts behind him," Fugita horimaka!" Shouts of cheeriness and applause can be heard. You are lifted up, and then released but still kept under guard. You are tied to a large, slanted board of tree bark spread eagle. You attempt to squirm free, but they fasten the vines on even tighter and all you get is more laughter and applause from the crowd of sneasel-things. The one that appears to be the leader whips out a feather. Still trapped, you scan your surroundings. A large clearing, edged by rainforest trees, and you appear to be on a stage. More jeering can be heard from the crowd as the feather massages your foot. You attempt to not laugh, you can't be embarrassed now. Another feather comes out of behind the sneasel's head and begins tickling your other foot. You continue to squirm, but are determined not to laugh they stop tickling your feet. Instead, they go for your belly. To your horror, the two feathers begin to rub all over your belly. Your beak begins to clatter: you can't hold it in for much longer. They unmercifully tickle all over your sensitive belly. Another sneasel joins in, tickling your wingpits. Yet another sneasel goes to work on your sides. If they keep tickling you, you might wet yourself!
15311.title: Continue

1532.content: The dark forest looms ahead of you; you will head inside. As you walk through vines and other untamed shrubbery, you decide to eat some of the Tickle Forest's most amazing delicacies: Rojo berries. They will give you a great amount of energy to speed you up for the next few days. A few miles in, the forest became more dense. Vines and brambles began to trip you and you finally slumped to the ground in defeat. Several vines mysteriously come put of a tree and encircle your wings and ankles. Now the vines have you in their grasp. What will you do.?
1532.title: Walk through it

15322.content:
You admit defeat, and several vines withdraw from the ground. A witch-like voice cackles," now you'll pay for trespassing..." A vine reaches for your feet and gently begins it's work. The vines are too tight around your body so struggling is not an option. "Hehehahah. Hehe! Hahahaha!!!" The vines tickle harder, faster. The sensations are so tickly it's impossible to ignore it.

The vines holding your wings raise themselves up, exposing your feathery underwings. In response, the vines engage and begin to assault your pits. "Hehehahahaha!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!" The ticklish sensations are driving you crazy, the vines dance around in your hollows, and they don't stop; instead, the torture reaches new heights. They tickle without mercy, and you're not sure, but you think you might be hearing the voice saying things like," tickle tickle!" And "cootchie cootchie coo!"

Finally, the vines cease the underwing torture and begin to attack your feathery belly. As your belly recieves it's torture, you struggle and squirm, your belly is your second most ticklish spot!"awww," the voice cackles," is the little Hawkmon ticklish?" You can barely nod your head. Your thoughts are completely jumbled together; half of your head says you're loving every second of this, and the other half says you need to get free and continue to the tickle mansion, but your body says you need to get free before you wet yourself. There is no escape however as your body continues to jiggle, all the while the vines split up and tickle you eslsewhere: the feet, wingpits, sides, and thighs.

You need to do something! ...like...
15322.title: Surrender

153221.content: "P-P-PLEAHEHEHAHAHEASE STAHAHAHAHAHAHAP THIHAHAHAHIS!!!" The vines tickle all over without mercy, and you need free. The tingling sensation is too much, but suddenly you are knocked out...
153221.title: Beg 4 mercy

1532211.content:
You awaken to find yourself tied on a table in a log cabin, you feel too tired to move from all the tickling. The witch who was tickling you before reveals herself to be a Fox with green colored fur wearing a green robe. She smirks at you and you gulp.

"Look I have a friend who needs me, so what's it going to take for me to save her?" You ask.

"It'll take you agreeing to live here for say two weeks and let me tickle you whenever I wish, also I'll go and get your friend." The witch explained.

You think over this decision, you want to save Biyomon yourself but you have no real way of escaping this situation. Of course the witch can't be mean if she's offering to rescue someone she doesn't even know. You finally reach a decision.
1532211.title: Continue

1533.content: "Whaaaat?!" The voice in your skull pounds. "Don't be a wimp! This is for your gf! Plus you'll get to tell her how hard it was!" "She's not my girlfriend! But..." You feel like an idiot talking to yourself, but it's seems that your mind has a mind of it's own, ironic as it is. "Girlfriend! Girlfriend! Hawkmon & biyomon! Haha!" You smash your head against a nearby tree, erasing the voice from your mind, at least temporarily.
1533.title: Go around it

choices: The haunted mansion of doctor Tickell?
15333.content: You decide to go through...
15333.title: Take a different route entirely

155.content: You are Mewtwo, and your mission is to go rescue Renamon from the Tickle Mansion. With this in mind you continue to make your way towards the Tickle Mansion. As you walk along, you hear footsteps behind you. But before you can turn around, something hits you over the head, knocking you out. When you come to, you find yourself bound to an x-frame in some sort of cabin. You try to use your psychic powers to break free, but some force is keeping you from activating your powers. Just then a door opens, and in walks...
155.title: As Mewtwo must save Renamon

1553.content:
...the Harpy Lady Sisters. They take a moment to smirk at you before deciding upon which parts of you they intend to tickle.

"I'll take his chest and armpits," says the one with purple hair.
"I'll take his belly and waist," says the one with orange hair.
"Then I'll take his feet," says the one with blue hair.

They then approach you and begin to tickle their chosen targets with...
1553.title: The Harpy Lady Sisters

info.brief_description: You've read Bing's Tickle Mansion; now see how you get there.
info.description: You are a traveler on your way to Bing's Tickle Mansion. What you are, why you're going, what you do along the way, and if you ever get there is up to you. Keep it clean-ish.
info.pretty_title: The Journey to Bing's Tickle Mansion
